artist: Forger in the manner of Auguste Rodin
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles R. Henschel
medium: Graphite and watercolor wash on paper
provenance: Ruth Kerr Henschel, New York [widow of Charles R. Henschel, who was for many years president of M. Knoedler, Inc., New York]; given to MIA, 1942.
signed: Signed, lower right corner: Rodin (by forger)
title: Nude Reclining
